Uses of Package
video_poker

  • Packages that use video_poker 
    Package Description
    combinations
    This package implements both combination checkers and rules to be used in video poker strategies.
    gui
    This package contains GUI related classes
    state_machine
    This package contains state machine interfaces and required classes for game execution
    video_poker
    This package implements the main Video Poker classes and Methods.

    Class and Description

    Public Card Class

    Represents the deck of cards

    Exception thrown when one tries to draw a card from an empty deck

    Exception thrown when one tries to get more credit than a user has
